comments.name: Chastity
comments.body: I miss you! Call me soon!

comments.name: Donnovan
comments.body: Missed you at the spot yesterday.

diary.title: SHE'S BREAKING MY HEART
diary.body: My gf, Vanessa, and I got into a huge fight at the mall today. We went into Zumiez to look for matching beanies, and she was totally flirting with this tatted up employee. His tattoos weren't even that cool. Mine are going to be so much better. I would totally have a sleeve by now, but my parents said that I can't get any tattoos untill I turn eighteen. I'm definitely going to get one before then. My parents will never know. I'm thinking that my first one is going to be a skull. After we made up, Vanessa told me that my first tattoo should be our initails in a heart. I told her that was a lame idea, and now we're fighting again. Why can't she just get over it?

diary.title: GET ME OUT OF THIS HOUSE
diary.body: Parents just don't get it. Last night, my mom barged into my room and took my iPod. She told me that I can have it back when I clean my 'black hole' of a room. I don't know what she's talking about because I know exactly where everything is in here. I have a system, and it works. She just doesn't understand my aesthetic. Whatever. Lucky for her, I can't go too much longer just listening to the thoughts inside my head, so I guess I'll clean my room. Lame.
